entry.source: {F812}Bishamonten\0{F87A,59}{F813,0,351301}It appears that you have defeated all{F801}of the Four Devas.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351302}Now, we shall proceed to the final{F801}portion of the trial.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351303}You must fight us, the Four Pillars,{F801}and emerge victorious...{F801}
